Reviews.Title: Product was defective, but seller is doing an exchange.
Reviews.Author: quaero4
Reviews.Content: I was initially upset because I thought the seller had not responded to my problems with the item.  He has, in fact, responded and has agreed to accept a return and provide a replacement.  More on this later after I receive the replacement item.  This was to have been a "refurbished" machine, but was not and had a few problems.  The seller sells both refurbished and used machines and got the order confused.  I think he is making good on correcting the error.

ProductInfo.Features:
Genuine Windows 7 Home Premium
Core i7 2.13GHz processor
4 GB DDR3 memory
120 GB hard drive
ProductInfo.Name: HP Elitebook 2540p Notebook, Core i7 2.13GHz, 120GB, 4GB, DVD-RW, 12" Widescreen Display, Sold by a Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher
